subject: [Agents] Implement Security tab + unify plugin warning generation
description:
Intent:
- Provide read-only effective security posture in CP and deduplicate warning logic.

Assumptions:
- SecurityPolicyService is the shared source for effective values and warnings.

Design + invariants:
- Never expose raw token/secret values.
- Keep auth/rate-limit behavior unchanged.

Diff plan:
- src/templates/agents/security.twig
- src/controllers/DashboardController.php
- src/Plugin.php (warning path uses shared service)

Verification:
- Security tab reflects env values accurately and warnings match runtime posture.
